title: Ukraine Forces a Halt to Flow of Natural Gas From Russia to Europe
content: A transnational pipeline was shut down on Wednesday after Kyiv refused to renew an agreement that allowed for the transit of Russian gas through its territory.

title: Understanding the Economic Impact of Artificial Intelligence
content: AI is transforming industries across the globe. From healthcare to finance, artificial intelligence is reshaping how we work and live. But its widespread use also raises questions about its economic impact.
